title: Base64 Basics
description:
Base64 is a common encoding scheme used to represent binary data in ASCII text.

Your task: Decode the following string:

RkxBR3tiYXNlNjRfZGVjb2RlZH0=

 The flag format is FLAG{decrypted_text}
hints: Look for the Base64 Decode operation in CyberChef
The string ends with '=' which is a Base64 padding character
The output should be readable English
